description:
She is the youngest professional snowboarder. Amu and the other guardians meet her when their class takes a trip to a lodge for snowboarding lessons. Mifuyu speaks like a boy. She often gets nervous when competing, and her Shugo Chara Snoppe is born from her desire to become more courageous.
However, Nikaido`s words cause her to lose her courage, and Snoppe returns to her egg. Snoppe eventually turns into a X Chara, but Amu heals her and Mifuyu is able to return to the competition.
name: Torii Mifuyu
